backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, inquiries, WhatsApp queries, bookings, and shipment tracking with access‑controlled CRUD APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a favicon addition to affected frontend file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list summarizing multiple frontend files and their roles across styling, sections, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with favicon link and script mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing all site sections and layout.
frontend/src/components/site/gallery/Gal: Lightbox dialog for viewing gallery images with escape handling and close controls.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Renders an About Us section with company values, descriptive text, and a grid of value cards using icons.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Bo: Implements a delivery booking form with validation, submission handling, and auto-reset after success.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Provides a contact form with validation, inquiry submission, and WhatsApp message integration.
Displays courier partners and enables sending pre-filled WhatsApp queries via backend submission.
Shows delivery coverage areas, service info, and nationwide pickup details with icon-enhanced cards.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ga: Presents a small image gallery with lightbox functionality for viewing selected images.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Landing hero section with headline, stats, and buttons that scroll to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/La: Form to load label details by tracking number and print them, with loading, error, and not‑found states.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Displays a grid of service cards with icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Tr: Tracking form that fetches shipment info and shows status, errors, and not‑found messages.
Footer component with branding, navigation links, services list, contact info, and social icons.
Responsive header with brand, desktop/mobile nav, and smooth-scroll navigation controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabelDetails.ts: React Query hook that fetches label details from the backend actor using a tracking number.
frontend/src/hooks/useOneShotTimeout.ts: Schedules a single-run timeout triggered by a boolean flag with cleanup and stable callback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBooking.ts: Mutation hook to submit booking data via the backend actor and invalidate booking queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: React Query mutation hook that submits an inquiry through the actor and invalidates the inquiries cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitWhatsAppQuer: React Query mutation hook that submits a WhatsApp inquiry via the actor and invalidates the WhatsApp queries cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingInfo.ts: Fetches shipment tracking info from the actor using React Query with conditional enabling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, component utilities, and print styles.
frontend/src/lib/validation/booking.ts: Validates booking form fields with rules for sender, receiver, locations, package details, and pickup time.
frontend/src/lib/validation/contactInqui: Validates contact inquiry form fields including name, phone, email, and message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds prefilled WhatsApp message text and generates wa.me URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with theming, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata and feature tracking for adding a favicon to the frontend.
